name: Eternal Eden (2008)
description:
PLAY THE 2008 EDITION FOR FREE

The acclaimed 2008 game, which received a 9/10 rating from RPGFan, is now available to play for free on Itch.

If you enjoy the game and would like to support our new and ongoing game production, we welcome a donation of your choosing.

This 2008 version now serves as a proof-of-concept ‘prototype’ for the upcoming Reboot Edition and other special editions. Your support helps Blossomsoft continue to innovate and improve 2D gaming experience for jRPGs.

UPCOMING REBOOT OF THE SAME GAME UNDER MAKING
